about_the_game:
Defense of the Dauntless is a endless horde roguelite tower defense. Build your path, your way. Defend against increasingly stronger enemies. Grow your arsenal with reinforcements. Unleash powerful hero attacks to sway the tide of battle in your favor.

This demo features the base tier of towers and 3 heroes you can unlock and play with. Enjoy!

name: Defense of the Dauntless Demo
short_description: Endless horde mode tower defense with permanent and per-run progression. Unlock dozens of towers, survive and become dauntless.
